creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: 6 panel screens with various scenes divided by gold clouds; at R, men and women are gathered in a room with two female musicians; at LR, a man on a verandah gazes inside at a kneeling woman; other groups of men around outside; other vignettes of people gathered outside, near carriages, or inside rooms with verandahs
medium: Ink, colors, and silver on gold
title: Tale of Genji
